actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-672.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 217 - 196 (Record Vote No: 85).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5394) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 2 of the first concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 1985, as passed the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5394 (budget reconciliation).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5394) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 2 of the first concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 1985, as passed the House of Representatives.
